(UNITURN mérőállomás doboz fedlap 2)
(cmd line: -i uniturn_doboz_fedlap_22.txt -t)
(szerszám beállítás)

t2 m d2 h19

safe0,0,3

yxz

(1.menet)

t2
s50
f600

safetop0.250
safebottom0.250
overcut0.300

emax0.040

fmax900
fmin400
fratio0.6

pre_mill_steps2

offset1,1,0

ox =  0.00

my = 26.3
mx = 35.7
mx = add($mx,$ox)
ma = 12.05

print "mx: $mx"
print "my: $my"
print "ma: $ma"

hx = 63
hx = add($hx,$ox)
hy = 30

c1 = 0.030 #furatok
c2 = 0.120 #keret

z2 = 3.5

print "c2=$c2"
print "z2=$z2"

hx1 = 45
hx1 = add($hx1,$ox)

j1 = 0.3
j2 = 0.15





(2. menet)

t2

f450

my = 26.3
mx = 35.7
mx = add($mx,$ox)

print "mx: $mx"
print "my: $my"
print "ma: $ma"

c2 = 4
z2 = 4

j1 = 0.4

print "c2=$c2"
print "z2=$z2"

b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 z$z2 c$c2 ng jg$j1 nc m1
